ygData.subject: RE: RE Bardic Binding Bellow.
ygData.msgSnippet: ... A better idea would be to make a petition that ALL non-binding classes could participate in. You ll get many more responses from that than just singling
ygData.messageBody:
> Everyone who supports this song, please e-mail me
> your name. I would like to send this proposal to
> Verant, with a list of names (read paying customers)
> supporting the idea.

A better idea would be to make a petition that ALL non-binding classes could
participate in. You'll get many more responses from that than just singling
out one class that can not bind. You're also a lot more likely to get Verant
to listen to a suggestion of allowing all players to be
bound like caster can than you are of simply adding another
class that can bind. *Especially* a group bind.

For a bard only they'd have to create/program a new song.

To make all players bindable anywhere, it's just a flag that gets set that
needs to be altered.
